mapper.sql: ID, EQP_ID, EQP_CODE, FUNCTION_ID, FUNCTION_CODE, SWITCH_FLAG, ACTIVE_FLAG, REMARKS, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_DATE, DEL_FLAG, VER_NO
mapper.select: select switch_flag from md_eqp_function a where eqp_code=#{deviceCode} and function_code=#{functionCode} and del_flag = '0' and exists( select a.function_code from md_eqp_function_define b where a.function_code = b.function_code and active_flag = '1' and del_flag = '0' )
mapper.insert: insert into md_eqp_function (ID, EQP_ID, EQP_CODE, FUNCTION_ID, FUNCTION_CODE, SWITCH_FLAG, ACTIVE_FLAG, REMARKS, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_DATE, DEL_FLAG, VER_NO) values (uuid(), #{eqpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eqpCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{functionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{functionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{switchFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{activeFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{verNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

mapper.update:
update md_eqp_function
EQP_ID = #{eqpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EQP_CODE = #{eqpCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FUNCTION_ID = #{functionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FUNCTION_CODE = #{functionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SWITCH_FLAG = #{switchFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
ACTIVE_FLAG = #{activeFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_BY = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
VER_NO = #{verNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update md_eqp_function set EQP_ID = #{eqpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EQP_CODE = #{eqpCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FUNCTION_ID = #{functionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FUNCTION_CODE = #{functionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SWITCH_FLAG = #{switchFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, ACTIVE_FLAG = #{activeFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_BY = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, VER_NO = #{verNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
